name: Vacto
description:
Welcome to Vacto, a game where robots play dodgeball with vacuums.

This is a Local Multiplayer game supporting minimum two players and up to two players. We hope you have two players.

=

Hit the opposing player with the ball, and don't get hit yourself!

As time goes on the ball gets faster and the ball is only out for blood after its picked up.

Have fun!

Controls: |||| [Player 1:] |||||

 A /D Left and Right, W to Jump

 C / V for vacuum rotation

Space for sucking antics

=

||||| [Player 2:] |||||

L / R arrow keys, UP arrow to Jump

Period [ . ]  and Comma [ , ] for vacuum rotation

 Slash to suck epically

=

(We also hope you have numpad.)

ALL ART ASSETS MADE DURING JAM [EXCLUDING MUSIC & VINE BOOM LOL]

[MUSIC RIGHTS BELONG TO JAGEX, HOWEVER THEY ARE NOT COPYRIGHTED!]
